The fit and length receive mixed feedback - while some say it's great, others find it very tight and too long. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Dress!!
items.body: The mailman JUST delivered this dress, and I love it! Definitely a 5 star review! As you can see from the photo, I was totally unadorned and unmade up (it was 10 am, and I'm retired!), but wanted to try it on right away to see if I'd keep it. The first thing I noticed was that the fabric is substantial and heavy, which is great for the cold months. Then I noticed how long it is! The sleeves are very long, and I have long arms. I slipped it over my head (no zippers or hooks necessary), and felt how nice and stretchy and COMFORTABLE it is. And the length is great. I am 5'8" and am used to things not being long enough, but this dress is certainly not one of them. I weigh 160, and I ordered a L, and it's a perfect fit. This will be my Christmas dress, and I can't recommend it more highly for all the things I've mentioned. Read more
items.author: William Campbell

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars GORGEOUS
items.body: Amazon suggested 2XX, So ordered that. The material was excellent. The bust and waist fit perfectly and I looked amazing. EXCEPT, it was a tad too tight for my apron belly and hips. I've seen other women wearing clothes about the same tightness, but I don't feel attractive with it. The hem was long (I'm 5'3") but would have been fine with heels. I was so sad to have to return it because my upper body looked gorgeous! Read more
items.author: Sandy Caswell

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great dress!
items.body: Beautiful, comfy and I received sooo many compliments! So happy I purchased this dress for my daughterâ€™s Sweet 16 Winter Wonderland themed birthday celebration. I only gave it a 4 stars because pockets would have made it a full 5 stars Read more
items.author: Dnippy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works well for large chests!!
items.body: I donâ€™t often write reviews but this dress is great! I am 190lbs and 5â€™7â€. I have large breasts (34 I) and it is always very hard for me to find dresses with this type of top that donâ€™t scoop too low. This dress fits in all the right places and I will not have to worry about the top moving. I got an XL I am kinda surprised at how it hugs I would have thought it would be looser but it works perfect. I am taller than the average woman but not by much the the length hits right above my ankles. It will work for any winter event or wedding! It feels like good quality as well not cheap looking at all. Read more
items.author: Alexandra Zedan

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fit nice! Warm and soft!
items.body: Fit perfect, great color, perfect for outside fall wedding. Just soft and warm, good length too! Read more
items.author: Rebekah

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Pretty dress, but not made correctly!
items.body: Bought dress for Christmas party on Dec. 6. Went to put it on to accessorize it and the velvet is not running the same way so front is darker thank back. Canâ€™t wear itðŸ˜¡ The return window closed November so canâ€™t return it. Now stuck with dress I canâ€™t wear. I did not notice the difference in color until I put it on under brighter lights. Pretty dress, but not sewed properly. Very very disappointed. The length was also too long and not what the picture showed. Read more
items.author: Dee

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Wine Red, Blue, Purple, Royal Blue, Black, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
